biotools.summary: Database for meta-analysis of the prognostic value of genes. It has features of 1) a large collection of publicly available cancer microarray datasets with clinical annotation, as well as 2) a tool for assessing the biological relationship between gene expression and prognosis.

bioschemas.name: PrognoScan
bioschemas.summary: Database for meta-analysis of the prognostic value of genes. It has features of 1) a large collection of publicly available cancer microarray datasets with clinical annotation, as well as 2) a tool for assessing the biological relationship between gene expression and prognosis.
